patthana22.13:4.1: Nakusalaṃ naniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.13:5.1: Naakusalaṃ naaniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.13:5.2: Naabyākataṃ naaniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.13:5.3: Naakusalaṃ naaniyyānikañca naabyākataṃ naaniyyānikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.13:5.5: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
